segments.text: Well , I ’ Ve looked over your resume , Mr . Peepers .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , Ted , this is a very impressive resume . However , we do have several other applicants to finish interviewing before we can make a final decision . We ’ ll call you by Friday , if that ’ s all right .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have any other questions ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , what kind of salary do you provide ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Salary is based on experience as well as time spent with our company .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Salary can be negotiated once we officially offer you the job .
segments.speaker: S1
